statements: SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule
SELECT id, machine_name FROM machine_maintenance_schedule
SELECT machine_name, last_maintenance_date FROM machine_maintenance_schedule
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE machine_name = 'MachineA';
SELECT machine_name, last_maintenance_date FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT machine_name, next_maintenance_date FROM machine_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY machine_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT MAX(next_maintenance_date) AS latest_maintenance_date FROM machine_maintenance_schedule
SELECT * FROM machine_schedule;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, maintenance_date FROM machine_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Monthly';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM equipment_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Quarterly' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM machine_schedule WHERE machine_id = 1
SELECT machine_name, maintenance_date FROM machine_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled'
SELECT * FROM equipment_schedule WHERE equipment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM equipment_schedule WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT machine_name) AS total_machines, COUNT(DISTINCT equipment_name) AS total_equipment FROM machine_schedule, equipment_schedule
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM machine_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT maintenance_type, technician_id FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_technician WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' AND maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE technician_id IN (SELECT technician_id FROM maintenance_technician WHERE experience_years > 5);
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE technician_id = 1001 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM machine_maintenance_schedule, maintenance_technician WHERE machine_maintenance_schedule.technician_id = maintenance_technician.technician_id;

SELECT DISTINCT machine_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM machine_maintenance_schedule INNER JOIN maintenance_technician ON machine_maintenance_schedule.technician_id = maintenance_technician.technician_id;
SELECT * FROM 3d_printing_machines;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer FROM 3d_printing_machines WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT machine_name, maintenance_interval FROM 3d_printing_machines ORDER BY maintenance_interval DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM 3d_printing_machines
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, manufacturer FROM 3d_printing_machines WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' LIMIT 10
SELECT machines.machine_name, schedule.maintenance_type FROM 3d_printing_machines AS machines INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule AS schedule ON machines.machine_id = schedule.machine_id
SELECT * FROM 3d_printers;
SELECT name, manufacturer, price FROM 3d_printers WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, build_volume FROM 3d_printers WHERE manufacturer = 'Creality' ORDER BY build_volume ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Calibration' AND technician = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM materials WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY type, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM 3d_printers ORDER BY name DESC, price ASC
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM 3d_printers WHERE price > 1000
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND technician = 'John Doe'
SELECT DISTINCT color FROM materials WHERE price < 50
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_printers FROM 3d_printers GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
